data.title: Reading Order Flowchart for Anne McCaffrey's Pern-Related Series
data.meta_description:
Hello.

Here is a reading-order flowchart for Anne McCaffrey's Dragonriders of Pern Series, as well as the Ireta, Crystal Universe, and "The Ship Who"...
data.text:

#1

Hello.

Here is a reading-order flowchart for Anne McCaffrey's Dragonriders of Pern Series, as well as the Ireta, Crystal Universe, and "The Ship Who" series.

I include them all in a single flowchart because all four series are set in the Federated Sapient Planets, although there is no overlap among the stories in the four series.

I hope you like it.

Comments, questions, corrections, and criticism are welcomed.

Mike

BAYLOR

There Are Always new Things to Learn.

23,867

#2

Welcome to Chrone and Like Your Asimov chart , this to impresses .

Of topic for a season. Mike have you ever read The John Grimes space saga by A Bertram Chandler ? if not I recommend it. Also his alt haste novel Kelly Country .

#3

Baylor,

For what it's worth, I have read many of Chandler's John Grimes stories. I read them during the 1960s and 1970s, mostly as halves of Ace Doubles.

As far as "Kelly Country" goes, I have never even seen it. Was it ever published outside of Australia?

LAter,

Mike
